This Blog & Me

31 July 2015 • updates

Welcome to my dark playground! I will be spending my “spare” time writing up posts that appear relevant to me and my life in the moment. Notice how I put spare in quotes – meaning that I will probably be writing these posts when I shouldn’t be. Oops. At least I can admit it.

Don’t worry, I’m a professional (notice the sarcasm). I have had a long history in relation to blogs, which I will talk about later on in this post. But for now, I want to warn you about my blogging habits: my goal is to post...
